title: Software Engineer
description:
We’re looking for problem solvers, innovators, and dreamers who are searching for anything but business as usual. Like us, you’re a high performer who’s an expert at your craft, constantly challenging the status quo. You value inclusivity and want to join a culture that empowers you to show up as your authentic self. You know that success hinges on commitment, that our differences make us stronger, and that the finish line is always sweeter when the whole team crosses together.
   

  

 Alteryx Designer Cloud has become a core growth engine for Alteryx. As a Software Engineer, you will contribute in the design and delivery of Designer Cloud workflows that integrate directly with leading CDWs like Databricks, Snowflake, BigQuery to perform Alteryx’s prep\\-and\\-blend operations at scale. You will be working on our inhouse workflow transformation engine in compiler, shape cross\\-package and monorepo architecture for performance, testability, and reliability, and partner with PM/UX to ship secure, high\\-quality platform capabilities.
   

  

**What You Get To Do In This Role**
* Develop and maintain scalable, responsive web components, pages, and features based on business requirements.
* Collaborate closely with design, product, and development teams to create seamless, interactive user interfaces.
* Contribute to frontend architecture and work with a variety of web technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, HTML, CSS, and Material UI.
* Work within a Design System to ensure consistency and quality across projects.
* Debug, troubleshoot, and ensure quality standards across frontend components.
* Actively participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices across the development team.
* Stay updated on new tools, frameworks, and best practices in frontend development.
* Work on some really exciting problem statements related to AI, cloud data platforms, nx/js, WebAssembly


**What You Should Have For This Role**
* 2\\+ years of experience in frontend development with expertise in at least one framework like React, Angular, Svelte, or Vue.js along with a good understanding of Vanilla JavaScript.
* Proficiency with CSS, HTML, and responsive design principles.
* Exposure to TypeScript and interest in building robust, type\\-safe applications.
* Familiarity with frontend build and deployment pipelines (e.g., Webpack, Docker, or similar).
* Proficient in using debugging tools and techniques.
* Basic understanding of RESTful APIs, cloud\\-based data handling, and real\\-time data communication.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
* Have a customer\\-centric mindset and would like to take on challenges irrespective of the difficulty level
* Ensure code quality and standards are maintained
* Train mentor mentor your juniors to become as good as you.


**Good To Have**
* Exposure to backend technologies like NodeJS.
* Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Databricks, or Snowflake.
* Basic understanding of Generative AI concepts.
* Hands\\-on experience with tracking tools like Google Analytics or Amplitude.


 Find yourself checking a lot of these boxes but doubting whether you should apply? At Alteryx, we support a growth mindset for our associates through all stages of their careers. If you meet some of the requirements and you share our values, we encourage you to apply. As part of our ongoing commitment to a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace, we’re invested in building teams with a wide variety of backgrounds, identities, and experiences.
   

  

 This position involves access to software/technology that is subject to U.S. export controls. Any job offer made will be contingent upon the applicant’s capacity to serve in compliance with U.S. export controls.

title: Frontend Engineer (India)
description:
As a Frontend Engineer, you will have the unique opportunity to shape the DNA of our user experience. Given the no/low\\-code nature of our platform, we're seeking someone who is not only technically adept but also deeply passionate about creating an engaging, intuitive, and performant user interface.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Work directly with the founders to conceptualize and implement an exceptional user interface.
* Lead frontend architecture decisions, ensuring the platform is scalable and maintainable.
* Drive forward web performance optimization.
* Advocate for and implement UI/UX best practices, ensuring users are at the heart of every design decision.
* Incorporate user feedback to continuously iterate and refine the platform.
* Stay updated with the latest frontend technologies and integrate them where relevant.
* Establish foundational frontend practices that will guide future team members.


**Requirements**
* Degree in a technical discipline, preferably computer science.
* Experience with React/NextJS or similar frontend frameworks.
* Experience with the entire web development process (design, development, and deployment).
* Ability to integrate seamlessly with backend APIs.
* Familiarity with source control tools, preferably Git.
* In\\-depth knowledge of responsive design.
* A keen eye for user experience and UI design.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* Problem\\-solving aptitude and enthusiasm for overcoming challenges.


**Nice To Have**
* Experience in early\\-stage startup environments.
* Experience with no/low\\-code platforms.
* Understanding of web performance optimization and best practices.
* Familiarity with Python FastAPI or similar backend frameworks.

title: Backend Engineer (India)
description:
VectorShift is a No\\-Code Generative AI Platform.
   

  

 As an Backend Engineer you will build new and work on existing VectorShift’s product lines (e.g., improving workflow run efficiency and scalability, integrate new developments in AI into our platform, manage our database infrastructure).
   

  

 This will be a challenging and dynamic role, and you will be working at the forefront of distributed systems infrastructure and AI.
   

  

 Along with building product lines, you can also expect to:
   

  

* Build integrations of the VectorShift platform with 3rd party applications
* Talk with customers to understanding core pain points and iterating with them on feature requests.
* Contribute to customer support, especially for the products you build!
* Stay up to date with the latest developments in AI to integrate new capabilities into our platform.


**Responsibilities**
* Work directly with the founders to conceptualize and implement sub\\-products and features, end to end.
* Lead technical architecture decisions, ensuring the platform is scalable and maintainable.
* Drive forward performance optimization.
* Establish foundational technical practices that will guide future team members.


**Requirements**
* Degree in a technical discipline, preferably computer science.
* Experience with Python/ FastAPI.
* Understanding of performance optimization best practices.
* Strong communication skills and ability to work in high paced environments.
* Excellent problem solving skills and proven ability to overcome challenges.


**Nice To Have**
* Experience in early\\-stage startup environments.
* Experience with no/low\\-code platforms.
* Experience in AI, machine learning, and building RAG workflows.

title: Web Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Shakuniya Solutions Pvt Ltd is a leading technology company specializing in innovative social networking and live streaming solutions. Our mission is to connect millions of users worldwide through engaging, real\\-time interactive experiences. With a focus on cutting\\-edge technologies and user\\-centric design, we develop platforms that foster community, entertainment, and live interactions. Our team is composed of passionate professionals dedicated to building scalable, reliable, and immersive digital experiences. We pride ourselves on a collaborative culture that encourages innovation, continuous learning, and excellence in delivering impactful products to our global user base.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking an experienced backend developer specializing in real\\-time communication to join our core team at Shakuniya Solutions Pvt Ltd. In this role, you will be instrumental in designing, developing, and scaling our complex backend systems that power live streaming, PK battles, and audio party rooms. Your expertise will help ensure seamless, low\\-latency interactions for millions of users engaging simultaneously across our platform. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of real\\-time data handling, WebRTC, WebSockets, and scalable backend architecture. You will work closely with frontend, mobile, and DevOps teams to deliver robust, secure, and high\\-performance backend services that support our innovative social features and user engagement tools.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a minimum of 3\\-5 years of proven experience in backend development, with a strong emphasis on real\\-time applications. You should have a solid proficiency in Node.js and its asynchronous programming paradigms such as Async/Await and Promises. Hands\\-on experience with WebSocket libraries like Socket.io is essential, particularly for building scalable chat and live update features. A thorough understanding of WebRTC, including signaling, STUN/TURN servers, and media streams, is required for managing live video and multi\\-user audio features. You should have extensive experience working with both NoSQL databases like MongoDB and Redis for speed and flexibility, as well as SQL databases like PostgreSQL or MySQL for structured data management. Familiarity with designing and maintaining RESTful or GraphQL APIs, deploying services on cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure, and troubleshooting complex backend issues is also necessary. Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast\\-paced environment are highly valued.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design \\& Develop: Architect, build, and maintain our core real\\-time backend services using Node.js, ensuring high scalability and performance.
* Real\\-Time Data: Implement and manage high\\-throughput, low\\-latency data flows for features such as live chat, gift animations, and user events utilizing Socket.io or similar WebSocket technologies.
* Video/Audio Streaming: Develop, integrate, and maintain WebRTC signaling servers to facilitate peer\\-to\\-peer and SFU (Selective Forwarding Unit) connections for live video streams and multi\\-user audio channels in our PK battles and party rooms.
* Database Management: Design, optimize, and manage backend databases, including NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis) and SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL), to handle high concurrency and ensure data integrity.
* Scalability \\& Performance: Ensure the backend infrastructure is scalable, reliable, and secure to support growing user demands and maintain high availability.
* API Development: Collaborate with frontend and mobile teams to design, develop, and document clean, efficient APIs that facilitate seamless integration.
* Troubleshooting: Proactively identify and resolve complex backend issues related to database performance, network latency, or real\\-time service outages to ensure uninterrupted user experience.


**Benefits**
 At Shakuniya Solutions Pvt Ltd, we offer a competitive salary package complemented by equity options to reward your contributions. Our comprehensive benefits include health, dental, and vision insurance to support your well\\-being. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge social products with a massive and passionate user base, providing a unique platform for professional growth and innovation. Our collaborative, fast\\-paced environment fosters creativity and continuous learning. We also promote a healthy work\\-life balance and provide opportunities for career advancement within a dynamic team dedicated to shaping the future of social networking and live streaming technology.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Shakuniya Solutions Pvt Ltd is committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate based on race, gender, age, religion, national origin, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe in fostering diversity and inclusion as essential elements of our success and innovation. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to any protected status, and we encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.

title: QA Engineer
description:
The QA Engineer will be responsible for ensuring the quality of our software products through meticulous manual testing. You will work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to identify defects, verify functionality, and ensure an exceptional user experience. This role focuses on hands\\-on testing, test case creation, and detailed reporting to maintain high standards of software quality.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Test Planning and Design: Create detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test cases based on product requirements and specifications.
* Manual Testing: Execute manual test cases to verify the functionality, usability, and performance of software applications across various platforms and devices.
* Defect Identification and Reporting: Identify, document, and track defects using bug\\-tracking tools (e.g., Jira, Linear), providing clear and detailed reproduction steps.
* Collaboration: Work closely with developers and product managers to understand requirements, provide feedback, and ensure defects are resolved effectively.
* Regression Testing: Perform regression testing to ensure new changes do not negatively impact existing functionality.
* User Acceptance Testing: Support user acceptance testing (UAT) by preparing test scenarios and assisting end\\-users during testing phases.
* Documentation: Maintain accurate and up\\-to\\-date test documentation, including test cases, test results, and defect reports.
* Quality Advocacy: Advocate for quality throughout the software development lifecycle, ensuring adherence to best practices and standards.


**Qualifications**
* Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* Technical Skills:
+ Strong understanding of software testing methodologies, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.
+ Familiarity with bug\\-tracking tools (e.g., Jira, Bugzilla)
+ Basic knowledge of software development processes

* Soft Skills:
+ Excellent attention to detail and problem\\-solving skills.
+ Strong communication skills to articulate defects and collaborate with cross\\-functional teams.
+ Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a fast\\-paced environment.

* Preferred Skills:
+ Experience testing web and/or mobile applications.
+ Familiarity with basic scripting or automation tools (e.g., Selenium, Postman) is a plus but not required.
+ Knowledge of SQL for database testing is an advantage.

title: Java Development Internship in Namakkal, Tiruchirappalli, Salem, Viluppuram, Dharmapuri, Chengalpattu, Theni, Tirunelveli, Erode, Madurai, Coimbatore, Chennai
description:
Are you a passionate Java developer looking to kickstart your career in the tech industry? We are looking for a talented Java Development intern to join our team at Gateway Software Solutions. As an intern, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects and gain hands\\-on experience in Java, MySQL, JSP, J2EE, Hibernate ORM, Spring MVC, and Spring Boot.

 If you are a motivated individual with a strong foundation in Java development and a passion for learning, we want to hear from you! Join us at Gateway Software Solutions and take the first step towards a successful career in software development. Apply now and unleash your potential!

title: Fullstack developer Java
description:
**Full stack engineer (Senior)**
* 
* 10\\+ years of professional experience in full stack software development.
* Proficiency in front\\-end technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, or Angular js.
* Strong knowledge of back\\-end development using Node.js, Python, or Java.
* Experience working with databases (SQL and NoSQL) such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MongoDB.
* Expertise in AWS cloud services, including EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, RDS, and DynamoDB.
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and microservices architecture.
* Knowledge of version control systems like Git and development workflows (CI/CD).
* Strong understanding of cloud security, scalability, and performance optimization on AWS.
* Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC) using Terraform or AWS CloudFormation.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
* Nice to have requirements to the candidate


 Prior experience working on projects with a lot of PII data or working in Financial Services industry is a "Plus"

* 6\\+ years of professional experience in full stack software development.
* Proficiency in front\\-end technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, or Angular js.
* Strong knowledge of back\\-end development using Node.js, Python, or Java.
* Experience working with databases (SQL and NoSQL) such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MongoDB.
* Expertise in AWS cloud services, including EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, RDS, and DynamoDB.

* Strong problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work both independently and collaboratively.

* 6\\+ years of professional experience in full stack software development.

* Experience working with databases (SQL and NoSQL) such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MongoDB.


**Nice to have**
 Prior experience working on projects with a lot of PII data or working in Financial Services industry is a "Plus"
   

  

**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events

* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

 Sr. Test Engineer \\- Playwright Job
   

  

 Date: Dec 27, 2025
   

  

 Job Requisition Id: 63295
   

  

 Location:
   

  

 Bangalore, KA, IN Bangalore, KA, IN
   

  

 YASH Technologies is a leading technology integrator specializing in helping clients reimagine operating models, enhance competitiveness, optimize costs, foster exceptional stakeholder experiences, and drive business transformation.
   

  

 At YASH, we’re a cluster of the brightest stars working with cutting\\-edge technologies. Our purpose is anchored in a single truth – bringing real positive changes in an increasingly virtual world and it drives us beyond generational gaps and disruptions of the future.
   

  

**We are looking forward to hire Playwright Professionals in the following areas :**
****Job Description:****
**Experience required:** 
 3\\-5 years.
   

  

****Requirements :****
**Job Title:** 
 QA Engineer (Manual \\& Automation Testing)
   

  

 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced QA Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both manual and automated testing, with specific expertise in
 **Playwright and Selenium using Java or Python.**
****Responsibilities:****
* Design, develop, and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases for both manual and automated testing.
* Develop and maintain automated test scripts using Playwright and Selenium frameworks.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to understand product requirements and ensure thorough testing coverage.
* Identify, document, and track software defects to resolution.
* Conduct regression testing to ensure application stability.
* Participate in code reviews and provide feedback on testability and quality.
* Create and maintain detailed test documentation and reports.
* Ensure compliance with industry best practices and testing standards.
* Mentor junior QA engineers and provide guidance on testing methodologies and tools.


****Qualifications:****
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* 3\\- 5 years of experience in software testing, with a strong focus on both manual and automated testing.
* Proven experience with Playwright or Selenium automation frameworks.
* Proficiency in Java or Python programming languages.
* Strong understanding of the software development lifecycle (SDLC) and Agile methodologies.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills.
* Experience with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) tools is a plus.


****Technical Skills:****
* Manual Testing: Expertise in designing and executing manual test cases.
* Automation Testing: Proficiency in Playwright or Selenium.
* Programming Languages: Java, Python.
* Test Case Design: Ability to create detailed and effective test cases.
* Regression Testing: Experience in conducting thorough regression tests.
* Bug Tracking Tools: Familiarity with tools like JIRA, Bugzilla.
* CI/CD Tools: Experience with Jenkins, GitLab CI, or similar.
* API Testing: Experience with tools like Postman, RestAssured or Karate.
* Database Testing: Proficiency in SQL and database testing.
* Version Control Systems: Experience with Git or other version control tools.
* Cloud Platforms: Familiarity with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.


****Skills:****
* Manual Testing
* Automation Testing
* Playwright/Selenium
* Java/Python
* Test Case Design
* Regression Testing
* Bug Tracking Tools
* Agile/Scrum
* SDLC
* CI/CD Tools
* API Testing
* Database Testing
* Version Control Systems


 At YASH, you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go while working in an inclusive team environment. We leverage career\\-oriented skilling models and optimize our collective intelligence aided with technology for continuous learning, unlearning, and relearning at a rapid pace and scale.
   

  

**Our Hyperlearning workplace is grounded upon four principles**
* Flexible work arrangements, Free spirit, and emotional positivity
* Agile self\\-determination, trust, transparency, and open collaboration
* All Support needed for the realization of business goals,
* Stable employment with a great atmosphere and ethical corporate culture

title: Technical Lead - MERN Stack
description:
**Description**
**The Opportunity :**
 At Illumine, we are pioneering next\\-generation technologies called
 **Adaptive Knowledge Systems** 
 \\- a new class of intelligent systems that go far beyond traditional learning platforms. These systems are designed to transform mindsets, enable discovery, and capture collective knowledge \\& intelligence at scale.
   

  

 Some examples of adaptive knowledge systems that we are building include :
   

  

* Transformational learning at scale i.e., learning focused on building values, reshaping attitudes/ mindsets, building thinking capacities, etc. at scale
* Collective Intelligence focused on collaborative problem\\-solving
* Counseling Tools/ Business toolboxes (custom builds for unique business challenges for clients e.g. trust\\-based customer engagement)


 Unlike conventional educational tools like MOOCs or SCORM\\-based systems, our work sits at the intersection of AI, Knowledge, and Business. These platforms use a combination of \\- AI\\-driven knowledge capture, Learning pedagogies, AI\\-driven collaboration models, collective problem\\-solving frameworks and many more.
   

  

 Our mission is to improve the quality of thinking and working in organizations and individuals to unlock new possibilities and prepare themselves for a BANI world.
   

  

 Join the
 **Knowledge Technology Team** 
 to be part of the mission and leverage (a) nearly 30 years of Illumines original research, innovation, and knowledge and (b) the core platform technologies \\& apps that have been tested \\& deployed to more than 1 million working professionals across industries and sectors (in the last 3 years alone).
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Next\\-Gen Technology Builder, you will
   

  

* Build, test, and deploy features using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) with a team of developers.
* Work on scaling and bringing engineering rigor for robust deployment (beta build mode)
* Solve complex, open\\-ended problems that require both creativity and engineering discipline
* Conceptualize and rapid prototype new ideas (alpha build mode)
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and domain experts to translate ideas into working systems
* Experiment with AI tools, low\\-code/no\\-code platforms, and emerging technologies to accelerate builds


**Will you enjoy this work?**
**Yes, If You**
* Love complex, challenging problems and can hold ambiguity without losing momentum.
* Are excited by AI, knowledge systems, and the future of learning and work.
* Enjoy switching between conceptual thinking and hands\\-on building.
* Have a builder mindset you like to prototype, test, and iterate.
* Can work in a fast\\-evolving, experimental environment where clarity emerges as you build.
* Value impact over routine and want to build something transformative.

title: Senior Staff Software Engineer/Principal Software Engineer
description:
We are seeking a strong JAVA Developer with good technical expertise, to be responsible for the quality of a highly scalable and distributed platform.
   

  

 You will be working as a key member of this collaborative team with a group of experts recognized around the world. This is an excellent opportunity to play a role as a key contributor in creating the next generation of network\\-centric distributed and scalable architectures.
   

  

**Job Description :\\-**
**Min requirements :\\-**
* 8\\+ years of experience in Java
* Professional experience building scalable distributed systems and working with data processing systems (Akka, Kafka, Spark, Storm, others.)
* Experience with NoSQL databases (MongoDB and Big Query is a plus)
* Experience with any of AWS, GCP or other cloud providers
* Experience in building complex systems with high performance, scalability and reliability.
* Should produce clean, elegant, maintainable, robust and well\\-tested code
* Should be able to mentor junior team members and acts as technical point of contact for a team.
* Server\\-side/RESTful API development experience in Java.
* Messaging systems (Active MQ, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Pub Sub)
* Experience of cloud native development using any of AWS, GCP or other cloud providers
* Micro\\-services architecture.
* Familiarity with RDBMS and NoSQL (MongoDB/Big Query) databases.
* Self\\-motivated, detail\\-oriented and strong analytical /problem solving skills.
* Good communication skills.


**About Us :\\-**
* Grid Dynamics is a leading provider of technology consulting, agile co\\-creation, scalable engineering and data science services for Fortune 500 corporations undergoing digital transformation.


 We work in close collaboration with our clients on digital transformation initiatives that span strategy consulting, early prototypes and enterprise\\-scale delivery of new digital platforms. We help organisations become more agile and create innovative digital products and experiences using deep expertise in emerging technology, top global engineering talent, lean software development practices, and high\\-performance product culture.
   

  

 Headquartered in Silicon Valley with over 4000\\+ technologists located in engineering delivery centers throughout the US, Central, India and Eastern Europe, Grid Dynamics has architected and delivered some of the most extensive digital transformation programs in the retail, technology and financial sectors to help its clients win market share, shorten time to market and reduce costs of digital operations on a massive scale.
   

  

 To learn more about Grid Dynamics, visit www.griddynamics.com, or follow us on Twitter @GridDynamics

title: Senior Engineering Lead
description:
**About Blitz**
 Blitz powers India’s fastest e\\-commerce deliveries, enabling
 **60\\-minute and same\\-day fulfillment** 
 for brands like Decathlon, Adidas, Puma, and Purplle. Our systems use
 **AI\\-driven logistics, real\\-time decisioning, and high\\-scale distributed architecture** 
 to deliver 98%\\+ success and 50% lower RTOs.
   

  

 We’re hiring a
 **Senior Engineering Lead** 
 who focuses on solving problems, driving outcomes, and measuring impact. This is a hands\\-on leadership role for someone who owns delivery end\\-to\\-end, leads critical systems, and raises engineering excellence across teams.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As a Senior Engineering Lead, you will:
   

  

* Lead multiple engineering initiatives from conception to measurable impact.
* Act as a hands\\-on IC for critical systems — design, code, review, and debug.
* Solve real business and operational problems, not just deliver requirements.
* Define success metrics for every project and validate solutions through data and monitoring.
* Improve reliability, observability, and performance across the tech stack.
* Influence engineers through technical depth, clarity, and high execution standards.


**Key Responsibilities**
**Outcome\\-Driven Engineering**
* Work backwards from the problem and architect solutions tied to clear business metrics (latency, reliability, throughput, DRR).
* Measure and monitor everything — dashboards, alerts, logs, SLOs.
* Iterate continuously until expected outcomes are achieved.


**Hands\\-On Technical Leadership**
* Write and review clean, scalable, high\\-quality code.
* Debug production issues quickly and lead root\\-cause analysis.
* Architect modular, fault\\-tolerant, and resilient systems.


**Execution \\& Process Leadership**
* Plan, track, and deliver multiple engineering projects on time.
* Create strong engineering processes: CI/CD, testing, deployment checks, observability.
* Maintain a high\\-velocity, low\\-defect release culture.


**Mentorship \\& Influence**
* Mentor engineers on system design, debugging, and problem\\-solving.
* Set and enforce engineering standards for quality, clarity, and measurable impact.
* Lead by example — influencing through capability, not hierarchy.


**Required Qualifications**
**Technical Expertise**
* 8–10 years of backend/full\\-stack engineering experience, with leadership responsibilities.
* Strong command of Java (Spring Boot), Python (Django/FastAPI), or Golang.
* Deep understanding of microservices, CQRS, DDD, and event\\-driven architecture.
* Experience with PostgreSQL, NoSQL, Redis/Hazelcast and opensearch.
* Familiarity with messaging systems such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, or AWS SQS.
* Comfortable with Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, AWS (ECS, EC2, API Gateway, Cognito).
* Knowledge of Prometheus, Grafana, distributed tracing.


**Leadership Experience**
* Led multiple engineering projects to measurable outcomes.
* Strong ability to identify risks early and design preventive systems.
* Experience mentoring engineers and raising technical standards.
* Able to balance hands\\-on execution with architecture and planning.


**Mindset \\& Culture Fit**
* Outcome\\-first, not output\\-first.
* Thinks in metrics and root causes, not assumptions.
* Ownership\\-driven — uptime, reliability, and system health matter personally.
* Thrives in fast\\-paced, high\\-accountability environments.


**Bonus Skills**
* Experience with AI\\-assisted development or AI agents.
* Background in logistics, supply chain, fintech, or high\\-scale transactional platforms.
* Expertise in performance engineering or incident management.


**Why Blitz**
* Contribute to systems powering millions of deliveries and decisions daily.
* Be part of a culture that values speed, clarity, reliability, and impact.
* Work on real\\-world, high\\-scale challenges that deliver immediate measurable outcomes.
* Shape India’s next\\-generation commerce and logistics ecosystem.

title: Mainframe Performance and Capacity Managment
description:
10\\+ years of strong experience in Mainframe performance specially Application performance tuning and optimization
   

  

* Strong knowledge and expertise with programming and performance tuning of Online and Batch applications comprising DB2, CICS, PL/1, COBOL, MQ, JCL, SYNCSORT, Utilities, Datasets and Storage
* Excellent working experience with performance management tools and products (like DB2 Explain, RMFMON 3, Strobe, APA, CICS Performance Analyzer and the Omegamon products)
* Strong knowledge of SMF record types and sub\\-types
* Ability to drive proactive performance management
* Have experience in reporting, presentations, Excel and other reporting tools
* Prior experience as Mainframe System programmer and or capacity planning is also a plus Analyse Mainframe Applications performance for both batch and online and recommend Application tuning opportunities
* Provide recommendations to Application Development organizations for applications tuning
* Help and guide Development organizations to implement tuning recommendations
* Follow\\-up proactively with development organizations to track progress on tuning recommendations
* Continuous exploration for optimization opportunities in Mainframe Systems and Online/Batch applications by gained experience and knowledge
* Create \\& present performance reports/metrics with recommendations for best\\-in\\-class efficiency solutions
* Report status to Management / stakeholders on overall tuning initiatives Preferred Loc: BLR, Pune

title: Sprouts.ai - Senior Salesforce Developer - Apex/Lightning Component Framework
description:
**What Youll Own (Outcomes, Not Tasks)**
* Managed Package \\& In\\-Salesforce Product Experience.
* Build and evolve Sprouts Salesforce managed package using Apex, Lightning Web Components (LWC), and Salesforce platform capabilities.
* Design an intuitive in\\-Salesforce experience for Sprouts insights, recommendations, and actions (record pages, utility bar, components, flows where needed).
* Own AppExchange\\-readiness quality: packaging strategy, versioning, dependency management, upgrade paths, and release discipline.
* Integration Architecture (Data, APIs, Events).
* Design scalable data models and sync patterns to connect Sprouts intelligence with Salesforce objects (standard \\+ custom) across Sales Cloud and Service Cloud.
* Build robust integration flows with Sprouts backend systems using REST APIs, webhooks, and event\\-driven patterns (including Platform Events / CDC where appropriate).
* Make integration decisions that balance correctness, performance, governor limits, and enterprise security expectations.
* Quality, Testing, CI/CD, and Release Engineering.
* Own the development workflow and engineering hygiene: Salesforce DX, Git branching, PR standards, automated validation, and deployment pipelines.
* Define the testing strategy (unit \\+ integration) and improve coverage without slowing delivery.
* Raise code quality through clear patterns, documentation, reusable utilities, and thoughtful reviews.
* Security, Compliance, and Scale.
* Implement Salesforce security best practices: CRUD/FLS enforcement, sharing model correctness, secure secrets handling, and safe API consumption.
* Design for enterprise scale: bulkification, async patterns (Queueable/Batch/Future as needed), resiliency, and predictable performance under governor limits.
* Partner with Engineering Leadership to ensure compliance and auditability expectations for enterprise customers.
* Cross\\-Functional Collaboration \\& Mentorship.
* Work closely with Product and Engineering Leadership to shape the roadmap and translate customer needs into scalable technical solutions.
* Communicate technical trade\\-offs clearly to non\\-technical stakeholders and help unblock delivery decisions fast.
* Mentor and guide developers as the Salesforce integration surface area (and team) grows.


**Tech \\& Tools Youll Work With**
* Salesforce: Apex, LWC, SOQL/SOSL, Flows (where appropriate), Platform Events / CDC.
* Dev tooling: Salesforce DX, Git, CI/CD (GitHub Actions / equivalent), scratch orgs, packaging tools.
* Integrations: REST/SOAP APIs, webhooks, middleware patterns (MuleSoft/Boomi/etc. exposure is a plus).
* Backend collaboration: API contracts, auth patterns, event streams (conceptual comfort expected).


**Must\\-Have Skills (Hard Filters)**
* 5\\+ years building on Salesforce (Apex, LWC, SOQL) with production responsibility.
* Hands\\-on experience building or contributing to Salesforce managed packages.
* Strong understanding of Sales Cloud and/or Service Cloud customization and config.
* Comfortable with Salesforce DX, source\\-driven development, Git workflows, and CI/CD.
* Strong integration fundamentals (REST/SOAP, auth patterns, data sync strategies, eventing).
* Deep knowledge of governor limits, security model, and how to build scalable, bulk\\-safe solutions.
* Clear communicator who can document and defend technical decisions.


**Nice\\-to\\-Haves (Strong Signals)**
* Salesforce Platform Developer I and/or II certification.
* Experience shipping products on the AppExchange end\\-to\\-end.
* Exposure to AI\\-powered Salesforce features (e.g., Agentforce or similar) and how to design experiences around them.
* Experience with integration tools / iPaaS (MuleSoft, Boomi, Workato, n8n, etc. Prior work on multi\\-tenant SaaS integrations and enterprise onboarding patterns.


**Please Dont Apply If**
* Youve only done point\\-and\\-click Salesforce admin work and havent shipped real Apex/LWC systems.
* Youre uncomfortable owning architecture decisions and making trade\\-offs under constraints.
* You expect slow cycles and heavy processes before you can ship value.
* You avoid documentation, testing discipline, or code reviews.


**Hiring Signals We Look For**
* Examples of complex Salesforce implementations youve led (especially managed packages and integrations).
* Clear articulation of how you handled governor limits, bulkification, and security constraints.
* Evidence of quality practices: testing strategy, CI/CD, deployment hygiene, Ability to explain trade\\-offs and simplify complexity for stakeholders.
* Proof that your work improved real outcomes (stability, performance, adoption, time\\-to\\-integrate, etc.

 Date: Dec 27, 2025
   

  

 Job Requisition Id: 63305
   

  

 Location:
   

  

 Hyderabad, TG, IN Hyderabad, IN Pune, IN Pune, MH, IN Hyderabad, IN
   

  

 YASH Technologies is a leading technology integrator specializing in helping clients reimagine operating models, enhance competitiveness, optimize costs, foster exceptional stakeholder experiences, and drive business transformation.
   

  

 At YASH, we’re a cluster of the brightest stars working with cutting\\-edge technologies. Our purpose is anchored in a single truth – bringing real positive changes in an increasingly virtual world and it drives us beyond generational gaps and disruptions of the future.
   

  

**We are looking forward to hire Salesforce Professionals in the following areas :**
**Experience**
 5\\-8 Years
   

  

**Job Description**
* Experience: 8–14 years overall \\| 4–8 years in Salesforce \\| 2\\+ years in SPIFF (preferred)


****Role Summary****
 We are looking for a hands\\-on Salesforce Technical Lead with strong expertise in Salesforce SPIFF (Incentive Compensation Management) to lead solution design, integrations, and delivery of scalable compensation and commission calculation solutions. You will partner with Sales Ops/Finance stakeholders, translate compensation plans into system configurations, and lead a team of developers to deliver secure, high\\-performance implementations.
   

  

****Key Responsibilities:****
